Scene:
The Monkey Dance
(Horikawa sarumawashi / 堀川猿廻し)

Play: Oshun and Dembei (近頃河原の達引)

Production: February 1974

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Toyotake Shimatayū VIII (豊竹嶋大夫 (八))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kizaemon II (野澤喜左衛門 (二))

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))
